    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • getBoard

        public chess.Piece[][] getBoard()

      • move

        public boolean move(java.lang.String source,
                    java.lang.String destination)
        move method: take input of string of the location that is to be moved and string of where that piece is to be moved. If the destination is contained within the list of possible moves for the source, the piece is moved to the destination. Returns true if moved and false if illegal move
        Parameters:
        source - Location to be moved
        destination - Location to be moved too
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the move was successful

      • promotion

        public void promotion(java.lang.String color,
                      java.lang.String[] input)
        This method first checks to see if moved piece is a pawn, then that is has moved all the way across the board. If so, the pawn is promoted to the requested piece if inputed and otherwise promoted to a queen.
        Parameters:
        color - Color of piece being moved
        input - Line input of move

      • enPass

        public void enPass(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> action,
                   chess.Piece[][] bord)
        enPass method: Checks for the conditions of an En Passant to occure, if they do then it will automatically finish the move and adjust the board
        Parameters:
        action - line input
        bord - The playing board

      • cast

        public void cast(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> locs,
                 chess.Piece[][] bord)

      • resign

        public void resign(java.lang.String color)
        method resign: takes parameter of color that is resigning and announces the winning of the other team
        Parameters:
        color - Color of player resigning

      • check

        public void check(java.lang.String color)
        check method: after each move check is called to run through all of the lists of possible moves of the opponents pieces. if the King of string color is in the list, it is under threat and check is called.
        Parameters:
        color - Color of player looking for Check

      • stalemate

        public boolean stalemate(java.lang.String color,
                         chess.Piece[][] bord)
        stalemate method: Checks to make sure the stalemate conditions are met, if they are then signals game over
        Parameters:
        color - Color of current player
        bord - The playing board
        Returns:
        void

      • checkmate

        public boolean checkmate(java.lang.String color,
                         chess.Piece[][] bord)
        checkmate method: Checks for the victory conditions of a checkmate, signals a victory if found
        Parameters:
        color - Color of player
        bord - Playing board
        Returns:
        void

        public void init()
        init method: when the program runs, init is first called and creates the appropriate piece objects and place them in the correct spots

        public java.lang.String convertBack(int[] item)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        location

      • convertTo

        public int[] convertTo(java.lang.String item)
        convertTo method: The program uses 2 kinds of location indicators, strings and arrays. This converts the strings used as input into arrays of ints
        Parameters:
        item - location to be converted
        Returns:
        array of location
